name: MASTERTEST
description:
MASTERTEST is a first person puzzle game where you have to manipulate objects with your perspective!

FREE FOR A WEEK!

You wake up in an abandoned, mostly overgrown laboratory, and have to escape it using your only power; moving and re scaling objects with your perspective.

  • Make sure you are playing the game on your dedicated graphics card.
  • You can change your settings using the "Settings.ini" file in the games directory.
  • Make sure to leave your comments and suggestions on the page!

The games in the alpha phase of development, currently containing 9 levels with more to come with each free update, so you'll help the development by buying the game :)

However if you are a content creator and just want to play the game for free, you can send me an email at samgames.sm@gmail.com and i'll send you a download key.
